title: snowflake.core.network_policy.NetworkPolicyResource | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Represents a reference to a Snowflake Network Policy resource.

With this network policy reference, you can create, update, and fetch information about network policies, as well
as perform certain actions on them.

if_exists (bool, optional) – Check the existence of this network policy before dropping it.
Default is None, which is equivalent to False.
